title.rendered: How to get free tickets for the Tango World Cup and Festival in Buenos Aires

content.rendered:
Today the Buenos Aires Tango Festival and World Cup started, the tango meeting that brings together more than 2000 artists who invite you to experience the diversity and energy of the genre. If you are in the Argentine capital and you did not know that you could get free tickets, here I explain how you can get one for yourself and one for a companion. They give maximum two per person. Be careful they try to scam you on the street or anywhere, selling you some. Remember that they are all free.

FOR THE EXHIBITION CENTER, THE CENTENARY PARK AMPHITHEATER AND THE TEATRO REGIO
For these cultural centers, prior ticket withdrawal is not necessary. Admission is by order of arrival until the capacity of each room is exhausted.

For the dance classes that take place in the Exhibition Center it is necessary to register half an hour before the start of the activity since space is limited.

FOR THE ACOUSTICS OF THE USINA DEL ARTE
Tickets are delivered the same day of the show at the Information Desk of the venue:
– At 2:00 p.m. the tickets for the functions scheduled until 5:30 p.m. will be delivered.
– At 5:00 p.m., tickets for functions scheduled for after 6:00 p.m. will be delivered.

FOR THE COLUMBUS THEATER
They will be delivered on Saturday, August 18, starting at 11:00 am, at the Exhibition Center ticket office, which is located at JE Couture 2231, between Vaz Ferreira and Av. Libres del Sur, behind the Faculty of Law. Click here so you know how to get there.

FOR LUNA PARK
Tickets for the finals of the Salon Tango and Stage Tango categories that will take place on this stage will be delivered on Monday, August 20, from 11:00 at the Exhibition Center ticket office. It is better to arrive a little earlier, because surely there will be people queuing before that time, and the tickets will be delivered until the capacity of 10,000 seats is exhausted.

FOR PARTIES, MILONGAS AND EXCLUSIVE CONCERTS AND PANORAMA
It is not necessary to pick up tickets in advance.
